SELECT ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as BIRTH, SEX, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDR FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
